thread.title: Chinese Small-Caps, Anyone?

author: Gerrard Cowan
title: Chinese Small-Caps, Anyone?
text:
One good-performing segment in emerging markets sounds like a risky proposition to some: Chinese small-caps. But Tiffany Hsiao, lead manager of the $46 million Matthews China Small Companies fund (MCSMX), says the stocks are misunderstood.
There is “a wall of worry” about Chinese small-caps, says Ms. Hsiao, head of Matthews Asia’s China small-companies strategy. Many investors see these companies as “copycat manufacturers with a lot of debt,” but these are misconceptions, she says. Many small Chinese companies were founded...
